== Palakkad (M) (803275) ==

Palakkad (M) is a town in the [[Palakkad]] taluka of [[Palakkad]] district with an area of 26.6 sq. km. and harbouring 31176 households with total population of 130955 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Palakkad]] is at a distance of 0 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 365 km. Male population is 63833 and female population is 67122. Scheduled Caste population is 10068 and Scheduled Tribes population is 213. Census Location Code of the town is 803275<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class I (population_total > 1,00,000).
The civic status of the town is 'Municipality'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Palakkad (m) at a distance of 0 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Coimbatore(m corp. )  at a distance of 48 km. Railway station is at Palakkad at a distance of 0 km.
